metadata.project_description: E2E/CI validation for Authelia SSO login without OTP/TOTP

context.problem_statement: Refine Playwright Authelia SSO login helpers to use username/password only (no TOTP), add client-side backoff/rate limiting, fail fast on OTP/2FA screen, and ensure production validate-production passes.
context.background: Production validate-production has repeatedly failed due to Authelia login issues; recent changes focused the suite to sso-gate and improved detection/backoff and cookie scoping.
goals: Validate production SSO works with username/password only
Fail fast if Authelia OTP/2FA screen is shown
Avoid brute-force behavior via client-side throttling/backoff
constraints: Must not leak credentials in logs
Production validation is performed via GitHub Actions
success_criteria: No navigation to /2fa/one-time-password in production validation

overall_status.current_blocker: Production GitHub Secrets SSO_USERNAME/SSO_PASSWORD appear to not match deployed Authelia users_database.yml; /api/firstfactor returns 401.
overall_status.summary: Code changes are in place; production validation is blocked on credentials mismatch causing Authelia /api/firstfactor 401.

best_practices: Fail fast on unexpected auth flows

tasks.title: Fix validate-production Authelia login failures
tasks.description: Ensure production validation does not hit OTP/2FA, uses username/password only, and succeeds.
tasks.notes: v1.0.236 and v1.0.237 validate-production failed due to /api/firstfactor 401 Authentication failed.

validation_status.process: Fix credentials mismatch; rerun Deploy validate-production

issue_status.issue_summary: Authelia API login returns 401 in production validation
issue_status.root_cause: Likely SSO_USERNAME/SSO_PASSWORD secrets do not match deployed Authelia users_database.yml (shows user admin / comment admin123).
issue_status.how_to_solve: Align GitHub Secrets to deployed credentials or rotate Authelia users_database to match intended secrets.

investigation_status.process: Review run logs and deployed Authelia config
findings: Deploy logs show users_database.yml contains user 'admin' and comment '# admin123'

issues_summary.title: Production validate-production failing due to Authelia /api/firstfactor 401
issues_summary.resolution: Align secrets to deployed users_database or rotate users_database

deployment_readiness.recommendation: Update GitHub Secrets to match deployed Authelia users_database credentials, then cut a new tag to rerun Deploy validate-production.
next_steps: Set repository secrets SSO_USERNAME/SSO_PASSWORD to match deployed Authelia users_database.yml
Cut v1.0.238 tag and monitor Deploy validate-production
